text: iwe dya shano dyetangagwa Sadoniki, dya mtandatu dyetangagwa akiki, iwe dya mfungate dyetangagwa kilisolito, na dya manane dyetangagwa zabalajadi, iwe dya kanda dyetangagwa yakuti injano, dya mlongo dyetangagwa kilisopulaso, iwe dya mlongo na imwenga dyetangagwa hiakinto, iwe dya mlongo na mbili dyetangagwa amesisto.
